About Me

Hi, my name's Hamza and I'm a computer science graduate from Queen Mary University of London with a 1st class.

As a highly adaptable and competent software engineer, I am proficient in Python, Java, and frontend languages and frameworks (HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React) with varying experiences in MongoDb, Django, MySQL, and C#.

I have a keen interest in software engineering and I'm enthused by the prospect of becoming a part of such a dynamic and stimulating field. I am confident the skills and determination that have brought me success in the past would stand me in good stead for the exciting challenges ahead.
